org.bk.ass.bt

Class Distributor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bk.ass.bt.TreeNode
      • org.bk.ass.bt.Distributor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the item used to create new nodes

    public class Distributor<T>
extends TreeNode
    This is like map for streams. Maps each item of a given list to a node. New nodes will only be created for new items. Nodes for items that are no longer present will be aborted and discarded.

    The created child nodes will be executed in parallel in the order of the item list.
